text: Peter Kaiser (1 October 1793 â€“ 23 February 1864) was a Liechtenstein historian and politician. He was known for being a great educator and for helping educate the poor of Liechtenstein. He statue of him is in Mauren. He was born in Mauren. Kaiser died in Chur, Switzerland, aged 70. title: Peter Kaiser
